Article Title: Champions Trophy: Nasser Hussain: Virat Kohli best ODI player of all time
Article Text:
Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel.

NEW DELHI: Former England captains Michael Atherton and Nasser Hussain are in awe of Virat Kohli 's impressive ODI statistics and think the Indian mainstay is likely the greatest batsman in the history of the sport.In a Champions Trophy encounter in Dubai on Sunday, Kohli led India to a resounding six-wicket victory over bitter rivals Pakistan with a masterful performance of unbroken 100, his 51st century in ODIs."Virat Kohli in a run-chase in 50-over cricket, there's been nobody better in the history of the game, really. 51 century is an unbelievable number," said the 56-year-old Atherton, who captained England in 54 Test matches, on 'Sky Sports Cricket Podcast'.Kohli joined the select company of Sachin Tendulkar (18,426 in 452 innings) and Kumar Sangakkara (14,234 in 380 innings) as the fastest batter to reach 14,000 ODI runs while en route to his century in his 299th 50-over outing."I mean, he's got 51 and he passed 14,000 runs, which only Tendulkar and Sangakkara have got past that mark in one-day cricket," Atherton continued."And he got them in 60-odd innings quicker than Sachin, and I think about 90-odd innings quicker than Kumar."So, I mean, ODI is probably his best. You know, he's been a great all-format player, clearly, but you'd probably say that ODI is his absolute best format."Hussain, England captain from 1999 to 2003, echoed similar remarks saying, "He's been an incredible player. Yeah, and you'd have to say probably the best player in ODIs of all time, really, with those stats you mentioned."You'd have Tendulkar in the same conversation. Kumar, you'd have AB de Villiers . They've been some great ones, but he's right at the top of the tree."
Article Summary: Former england captains michael atherton and nasser hussain are in awe of virat kohli's impressive odi statistics. The pair think the indian mainstay is likely the greatest batsman in the history of the sport. Kohli led india to a resounding six-wicket victory over bitter rivals pakistan.

Article Title: Chicago Blackhawks vs. Utah Hockey Club: Where to watch, what time, and key match details
Article Text:
Image via Matt Blewett-Imagn Images

How, When And Where To Watch The Game Against The Chicago Blackhawks And The Utah Hockey Club Tonight?



Can The Chicago Blackhawks Redeem Themselves After Losing The Last Three Matches In A Row?



The Chicago Blackhawks (17-33-7) are all set to play against the Utah Hockey Club (25-24-9) in a few hours and tensions are on the rise for fans of both the teams. The last time these tow teams played against each other, the Utah Hockey Club had defeated the Chicago Blackhawks. Here is everything you need to know to watch one of the most anticipated matches.The Chicago Blackhawks and the Utah Hockey Club are gearing up to play against each other at -Venue of the match - Delta Center, Utah, Salt LakeWhen will the match begin - The match begins at 9 PM ETDate of the match - 25th February (Tuesday)Viewers can also tune into ESPN+ to watch the match on TV. Apart from that, viewers can also live stream the match on Fubo.At this point in time, the Utah Hockey Club have a higher chance of winning than the Chicago Blackhawks. The Chicago Blackhawks have lost the last three matches that they have played in a row and fans are pretty stressed about it.The Utah Hockey Club have shown improvement in the last couple of matches and also managed to defeat the Vancouver Canucks recently. Fans and experts are confident that the Utah Hockey Club has a higher chance of winning tonight when it takes the ice against the Chicago Blackhawks.Regarding the injury report, both the Chicago Blackhawks and the Utah Hockey Club have certain important players who will not be playing tonight.For the Utah Hockey Club, this includes Robert Bortuzzo who has sustained a lower body injury and has been listed out. For the Chicago Blackhawks, Laurent Brossoit has sustained a knee injury and is out for tonight. Also, Jason Dickinson of the Blackhawks also has a lower body injury and wont be playing tonight.For the Utah Hockey Clib, their next two matches would be home matches; this incudes a match against the Minnesota Wild and the New Jersey Devils.Also Read: Oilers' Evander Kane was once sued for $500,000 by a Las Vegas casino months before he declared bankruptcy
Article Summary: The chicago blackhawks (17-33-7) are set to play against the utah hockey club (25-24-9) in a few hours. The last time these tow teams played against each other, theutah hockey club had defeated the chicago blackhawks. The chicago blackhawks have lost the last three matches that they have played in a row.

Article Title: Patrick Mahomes ditches Super Bowl sulk to party with Texas Tech fan after insane 94-foot putt—Brittany Mahomes watches courtside on date night
Article Text:
(Image via Getty)





Patrick Mahomes courtside at Texas Tech vs. Houston game, celebrating like it’s another Super Bowl win

in

Patrick Mahomes and Brittany Mahomes courtside at Texas Tech game, days after Super Bowl loss

“Back home.”

that guy

Read More

A Texas Tech fan pulled off a 94-foot putt during an on-court promotion, sending United Supermarkets Arena into absolute chaos. The shot—a full-court putt through a tiny slot in a poster—was so clean it looked scripted. Patrick Mahomes , sitting courtside, immediately jumped in on the action, running onto the floor and meeting the fan for a shoulder bump straight out of an NFL end zone celebration.Texas Tech fans didn’t have much to cheer about that night—their team fell 69-61 to the Houston Cougars—but this putt? This was the moment.Patrick Mahomes wasn’t just watching the game. He wasit—emotionally, at least. The Kansas City Chiefs quarterback, fresh off a Super Bowl loss to the Philadelphia Eagles, was back in Lubbock, Texas, sitting courtside with his wife, Brittany Mahomes .During the first half, while Texas Tech was struggling against Houston, a Red Raiders fan lined up for a longshot halftime contest. Full-court putt, 94 feet, straight to the hole. The crowd went dead silent as the ball made its slow journey across the hardwood. When it finally dropped in, the place exploded.Mahomes didn’t just clap from his seat. He stormed the court, shoulder-bumped the fan like he was celebrating a game-winning drive, and let the crowd’s energy carry the moment. It was one of the loudest reactions of the night—louder than anything Texas Tech did on the court.Patrick Mahomes and Brittany Mahomes turned the Texas Tech vs. Houston matchup into a courtside date night. The couple, back in their home state of Texas, sat front and center just two weeks after the Kansas City Chiefs’ Super Bowl 2025 loss to the Philadelphia Eagles.Mahomes, rocking his Texas Tech gear, spent most of the game fired up. He was up, yelling, reacting to plays—fully locked in. Brittany Mahomes, sitting beside him, was a little more lowkey but still all smiles.Texas Tech made sure to acknowledge its most famous alum, posting a courtside pic of Mahomes with the caption,Even with the Super Bowl loss still fresh, Mahomes looked at home, enjoying the energy of a fanbase that will always have his back.It was a moment of nostalgia, a break from the NFL grind, and proof that no matter how many Super Bowls he wins (or loses), Patrick Mahomes will always bein Lubbock.
Article Summary: Patrick mahomes and his wife, brittany, were courtside at a texas tech-houston game. A texas tech fan pulled off a 94-foot putt during an on-court promotion. Mahomes immediately jumped in on the action, running onto the floor and meeting the fan for a shoulder bump.

Article Title: “Annoying dealing with the media”: Elias Pettersson delivers fiery response to the media after Vancouver Canucks' consecutive losses
Article Text:
Image via Getty Images

Elias Pettersson’s performance falls short after major extension



The Vancouver Canucks are facing a significant drop in the 2024-25 NHL season, with Elias Pettersson 's lackluster year being a major factor in their inefficiency. However, Pettersson has grown tired of the constant questioning and is determined to step up consistently.Pettersson recently acknowledged his struggles with a blunt response, showing both frustration and determination as he works to improve during the Canucks’ tough season.Elias Pettersson, who signed an eight-year, $92.8 million contract extension in March 2024, has not lived up to expectations this season. Through 34 games, he has recorded just 10 goals and 18 assists (28 points), a significant dip compared to his usual output. His struggles have raised concerns, especially as the team looks to remain competitive in the playoff race.“It’s more annoying dealing with the media,” Canucks forward Elias Pettersson said, following a question from a Sportsnet reporter about confidence influencing scoring issues.The distractions surrounding the locker room have clearly impacted Pettersson’s performance, and Rick Tocchet ,head coach of Vancouver Canucks, hopes to see his star player regain confidence. Tocchet has observed Pettersson hesitating and overanalyzing his decisions on the ice.“I think he’s waiting for something. I don’t know if it’s a lack of confidence in his shot, but as soon as he has room, he’s got to take it and just got to blast it,” Rick Tocchet admitted after the 2-1 loss at Utah, via Sportsnet. “I’d rather him just rip a puck right now. He’s not moving his feet. I thought today, some shifts he was moving his feet and it looked like we had some glimpses. I don’t know if it’s a mental block right now, all year, but he’s got to move his feet.”With the March 7 trade deadline nearing, speculation about Pettersson’s future is growing. Analysts debate whether the Canucks should trade him for less than his value or keep him, hoping for a rebound.Also Read: Anaheim Ducks' Trevor Zegras suspended for 3 games without pay for interference on Detroit Red Wings' Michael Rasmussen Despite his scoring slump, Pettersson excels defensively, leading forwards with 237 defensive plays and 164 blocked passes, highlighting his two-way impact. As the Canucks push through the second half of the season, Pettersson's performance will be crucial in determining the team’s success and his long-term future with the franchise.
Article Summary: Elias pettersson signed an eight-year, $92.8 million contract extension in march 2024. Through 34 games, he has recorded just 10 goals and 18 assists (28 points) his struggles have raised concerns, especially as the team looks to remain competitive in the playoff race.

Article Title: Justin Tucker’s sexual misconduct allegations spark debate over equal treatment with Browns' Deshaun Watson
Article Text:
Image via Ric Tapia/Getty Images

Fans Question Why Is Justin Tucker Not Being Treated Like Deshaun Watson When He Was Accused Of Similar Sexual Misconduct Charges



Justin Tucker Has Denied All The Sexual Misconduct Allegations That He Has Been Accused Of



Justin Tucker, the star player of the Baltimore Ravens, has found himself in a huge controversy after massage therapists working at luxury spas accused him of inappropriate sexual behaviour, as per The Baltimore Banner. The Baltimore Banner reports that as many as sixteen women have accused the player of sexual misconduct and this seems like a flashback to when the Cleveland Browns’ Deshaun Watson was accused of a similar crime a few years back. Fans have questions about how the Justin Tucker situation is being handled as compared to Deshaun Watson’s.A fan took to X and wrote, “I’m still waiting on the world and sports media to drag Justin Tucker as they did Deshawn Watson keep that same energy!”, while another fan wrote, “Why is this not on the news like Deshawn Watson was. Deshawn was on national and local news on the reg. Why is Justin Tucker not being talked about more on national, local news and social media? Maybe he kept missing them field goals cause he was too ‘relaxed’ 🤷🏽‍♂️”A third fan wrote, “the fact the nfl allowed deshawn watson continue playing football is disturbing. now you’ve got justin tucker who has allegations that are getting near deshawn’s numbers. what number of women will be enough?”In 2021, Deshaun Watson was accused by more than twenty massage therapists of inappropriate sexual misconduct. It caused a huge uproar on social media and became a topic for debate. At that point in time, Deshaun Watson was playing for the Houston Texans.While his contract with the Houston Texans was not officially terminated, he did not play in any of the matches during the 2021 season of the NFL.By 2022, Deshaun Watson was traded to the Cleveland Browns but he was suspended for the first 11 matches during the 2022 season of the NFL and was fined a whopping $5 million. By November 2022, he was back to playing for the Cleveland Browns.The accusations against Deshaun Watson are oddly similar to the accusations against Baltimore Ravens’ Justin Tucker. After the women approached The Baltimore Banner with their story, Justin Tucker issued a statement regarding the controversy and denied all the allegations levied against him.In a social media statement, Justin Tucker said, “In accusing me of misconduct, the article takes innocuous, or ambiguous, interactions and skews them so out of proportion they are no longer recognizable, and it presents vague insinuations as fact. This is desperate tabloid fodder.”As per The Baltimore Banner, the NFL has started their investigations into the matter and is interviewing the women who have accused the Baltimore Ravens’ player.Also Read: Travis Kelce breaks his social media silence amid Taylor Swift's follower drop and gives fans hope
Article Summary: Justin tucker, the star player of the baltimore ravens, has found himself in a huge controversy after massage therapists working at luxury spas accused him of inappropriate sexual behaviour. The baltimore banner reports that as many as sixteen women have accused the player of sexual misconduct.

Article Title: “This not weird to y’all?” Ashley Nicole Moss calls out LeBron James’ friend for disturbing threats
Article Text:
CuffsTheLegend and Ashley Nicole Moss social media feud. Image via: cuffsthelegend | ashnicolemoss/ Instagram

Ashley Nicole Moss and CuffsTheLegend engaged in a heated social media clash



Ashley Nicole Moss and CuffsTheLegend

Ashley Nicole Moss has never shied away from speaking her mind, and her latest online clash has stirred up huge discussion. Moss recently found herself in a heated exchange with CuffsTheLegend . He has been a well-known social media figure and a longtime supporter of Los Angeles Lakers star LeBron James . Their disagreement quickly escalated into a full-fledged online battle extending it with accusations and harsh words exchanged between the two.found themselves in a fiery social media dispute. The confrontation began when CuffsTheLegend took issue with a video Moss posted on X. In the video, she playfully showed her football skills ahead of the NFL combine . In response, Cuffs created an Instagram reel criticizing her content, suggesting that she was using her appearance to gain attention rather than focusing solely on sports analysis.Moss didn’t take the criticism lightly. She quickly fired back, addressing the implications of Cuff’s comments. “I’m wearing a full-length dress. My body is my body. Maybe you should be exploring what went wrong during your pubescence years to where the sight of a fully clothed woman categorizes as a thirst trap,” Moss wrote on X. Her response on X gained quick attention propelling fans' reaction on the matter.This was just one of the direct responses from Moss for Cuffs. She also questioned why he would dedicate an entire reel to criticizing her. “A whole reel… this ain’t weird to y’all?” she posted, calling out the unnecessary scrutiny she faced.As the debate gained traction, Cuffs defended himself, claiming he was simply making an observation and that Moss was twisting his words. “Don’t try to turn this around on me and start making up lies about me too… I complimented you and gave you the attention you want. The whole league knows what you be doing, Ash,” he replied.However, Moss wasn’t interested in playing along. She escalated the matter by making a bold accusation against Cuffs, calling him out for his past behavior. “Funny coming from an unemployed r**e apologist who is on his knees for LeBron and all fours for KD on the regular,” Moss tweeted.Beyond this controversy, Moss has been making big moves in the sports world. She was recently named to Forbes’ “30 Under 30” list for sports in 2023. She also launched a new weekly NBA show, Triple Threat, on CBS Sports, where she discusses major topics from around the league. She is also quite popular on social media with over 257 thousand followers on Instagram.Also Read: Denver Nuggets vs Indiana Pacers (02/24): Box score, player stats, game summary, and more As for Cuffs, he also has a decent fanbase online who has been a long-time advocate of Los Angeles Lakers star LeBron James . He has over 52 thousand followers and 74 thousand on X.
Article Summary: Ashley nicole moss and cuffsthelegend engaged in a heated social media clash. The confrontation began when cuffs took issue with a video moss posted on x. moss has been making big moves in the sports world. She was recently named to forbes’ “30 under 30’ list for sports in 2023.

Article Title: ​Joe Burrow's old post resurfaces and raises eyebrows as fans believe they know why he can't lead Bengals to playoffs
Article Text:
Image via Cooper Neill/Getty

Joe Burrow’s Old Post Goes Viral But Fans Have Different Opinions On It Now



Joe Burrow’s Hand Size Was A Huge Topic For Debate Five Years Ago



Joe Burrow, the quarterback of the Cincinnati Bengals , has recorded an impressive performance in the 2024 season of the NFL but missed out on the playoffs and the subsequent Super Bowl trophy. Recently, ESPN’s SportsCentre shared a post on Joe Burrow that has raised eyebrows and has convinced fans about the reason behind why the star player has not been able to lead his team to the NFL Playoffs yet.ESPN’s SportsCentre recently shared a post on X about how it has been exactly five years since Joe Burrow made a post on X where he joked about how he would have to retire soon due to his small hands. Five years ago, as per ESPN, his hand size was measured to be nine inches. This caused a lot of memes and debates in 2020 but fans have a different opinion on it.A fan wrote, “his little hands is prolly why he cant make the playoffs”, while another fan wrote, “if they were bigger maybe he wouldn’t have been injured so much”.A third fan wrote, “Durability still remains an issue”, while another user wrote, “Fine enough to not win a Super Bowl, not make the playoffs afterwards. Overrated does not even scratch the surface with this guy. ✋🙄”However, some of Joe Burrow’s fans have strongly defended him against the trolls. A fan wrote, “Hand size drama! 😂 Who would've thought Joe Burrow would prove everyone wrong?! 🙌 Five years later, he's a Super Bowl contender and one of the NFL's top QBs! Guess hand size doesn't measure heart or talent! 💪”Another fan wrote, “Yes, this tweet is well aged! Joe Buro joked about the idea of retirement after his hand-sized measurements in the 2020 NFL combine and is now one of the top quarterback in the league.”A third fan supporting Joe Burrow wrote, “Joe Burrow’s hand size might have made some people laugh, but it was just a small moment in his path to becoming a star in the NFL.”In 2020, Joe Burrow’s hand size had become a huge topic for debate among fans. As he made the post on X in 2020, many of his teammates supported him. Even Patrick Mahomes replied to him about how his hands are 9.5 inches but he is “doing just fine”.Five years later, Joe Burrow is currently at the top of his game as he keeps recording impressive performances on the field. While he might not have won a Super Bowl in the 2024 season, fans are hopeful of a trophy in the next season.Also Read: Joe Burrow's old video goes viral as fans gush over him amid surprising new video by Cincinnati Bengals
Article Summary: Espn’s sportscentre shared a post on joe burrow that has raised eyebrows and convinced fans about the reason why the star player has not been able to lead his team to the nfl playoffs yet. Five years ago, as per espn, his hand size was measured to be nine inches. This caused a lot of memes and debates in 2020 but fans have a different opinion.

Article Title: Will Jayson Tatum play tonight against the Toronto Raptors? Latest update on the Boston Celtics star's injury report (February 25, 2025)
Article Text:
Is Jayson Tatum playing tonight? (Image via AP Photo/Charles Krupa)

Boston Celtics

Jayson Tatum

Is Jayson Tatum playing tonight? Boston Celtics injury report for tonight’s game against the Toronto Raptors (February 25, 2025)

Celtics injury report Feb 25 (Image via NBA)

Toronto Raptors injury report for tonight’s game against the Boston Celtics (February 25, 2025)

When and where to watch the Boston Celtics play tonight against the Toronto Raptors (February 25, 2025)?

Theare set to face the Toronto Raptors on Tuesday, February 25, at Scotiabank Arena, but all eyes are on the injury report, particularly the status of star forward. The Celtics, currently sitting at 41-16, are navigating a challenging stretch with five players listed on the injury report, though Tatum’s name is notably absent, signaling his availability for the crucial matchup. Jayson Tatum is going to play tonight against the Toronto Raptors. He has been a cornerstone for the Celtics this season, averaging 26.8 points per game, ranking seventh in the league. His contributions extend beyond scoring, as he leads the team with 8.8 rebounds per game and averages 3.6 three-pointers per contest, fourth in the NBA. Over the last 20 games, Tatum has maintained stellar numbers, posting 24.5 points, 8.0 rebounds, and 6.2 assists per game. His presence on the court is vital for Boston, which ranks sixth in the league with 117.4 points per game.While Jayson Tatum is healthy, the Celtics are dealing with other key absences. Jrue Holiday (rest) and Luke Kornet (personal) are ruled out, while Al Horford (toe) is questionable. Xavier Tillman (knee) and Neemias Queta (illness) are listed as probable. The team’s depth will be tested, but Tatum’s availability ensures the Celtics remain a formidable opponent.On the Raptors’ side, injuries continue to plague the struggling squad, which sits at 18-39. Key players like Brandon Ingram (ankle) and Jakob Poeltl (hip) are questionable or out, leaving Toronto shorthanded against a Celtics team that boasts a +532 scoring differential.The game tips off at 7:00 PM ET and will be broadcast on NBCS-BOS and TSN, with live streaming available on Fubo. Fans can also engage with FanDuel Fantasy for added excitement. For fans looking to support the team, officially licensed NBA gear is available at Fanatics, offering jerseys, hats, and more.Also read: Will Darius Garland play tonight against the Orlando Magic? Latest update on the Cleveland Cavaliers star's injury report (February 25, 2025) As the Celtics aim to maintain their dominance in the Eastern Conference, Jayson Tatum’s health and performance remain pivotal. With no injury concerns for the star forward, Boston looks poised to extend its winning momentum against a depleted Raptors squad.
Article Summary: The boston celtics are set to face the toronto raptors on tuesday, february 25, at scotiabank arena. Jayson tatum's name is notably absent, signaling his availability for the crucial matchup. The celtics, currently sitting at 41-16, are navigating a challenging stretch with five players listed on the injury report.

Article Title: What's next for Aaron Jones? The Vikings have indicated that they will reduce the running back's playing time if he returns
Article Text:
Image via Imagn Images

Vikings plan to reduce Aaron Jones’ playing time if he returns

The Minnesota Vikings are considering limiting the heavy use of veteran Aaron Jones , who set career highs in touches, carries, and offensive snaps in his first season. Despite injuries, Jones managed to play all 18 games and had the most rushing yards and second-most yards from scrimmage in his career. As he approaches free agency at 30, the Vikings plan to reduce his playing time if he returns.Aaron Jones signed a one-year contract with the Minnesota Vikings on March 12, 2024. In Week 12, he had 22 carries for 106 yards and a touchdown against the Chicago Bears. In 2024, he had 255 carries, 1,138 rushing yards, five rushing touchdowns, and 51 receptions for 408 yards and two touchdowns."The big thing for me is we loved having Aaron Jones, the impact he had," coach Kevin O'Connell told SiriusXM earlier this month. "For the better part of his career, he had kind of been a part of backfield committees, but for the most part, Aaron Jones was the feature back [in 2024]. ... So I would love to have Aaron back. And then we just continue to grow in that room, whether it's infusing a young player in the draft or maybe another player in free agency alongside Aaron Jones, hopefully."O'Connell's vision for the 2024 season was evident in a Week 1 victory over the New York Giants, where quarterback Ryan Jones played 52% of snaps and carried the ball 14 times for 94 yards and a touchdown. However, the Vikings lost faith in Chandler and Jones became more of an every-down player, playing 63% of offensive snaps and taking 67% of carries by running backs.Aaron Jones expressed his desire to return to Minnesota in 2025, following the Vikings' wild-card loss to the Los Angeles Rams. "We'll see how it plays out," he added, "but this is where I want to be." Jones, despite being best suited for rotational roles, is a top option in a presumptive free agent class alongside Najee Harris, J.K. Dobbins, Rico Dowdle, Javonte Williams, and Akers. His $7 million contract ranked 14th among running backs in average per year, and he could attract multiple suitors.Also read: Former New York Jets quarterback Aaron Rodgers has shared two key qualities he is seeking in his next team ESPN's Field Yates ranks Boise State's Ashton Jeanty, Iowa's Kaleb Johnson, North Carolina's Omarion Hampton, Ohio State's TreVeyon Henderson, and Georgia's Trevor Etienne as the top five available running backs in the draft, with the Vikings having the lowest total draft capital in the NFL.
Article Summary: Vikings plan to reduce aaron jones’ playing time if he returns. Jones set career highs in touches, carries, and offensive snaps in his first season. Despite injuries, jones managed to play all 18 games and had the most rushing yards and second-most yards from scrimmage.

Article Title: Is WWE Planning a Match between The Rock and Cody Rhodes? Exploring the Possibilities for WrestleMania 41
Article Text:
Image via WWE

The Rock returned to WWE SmackDown with an offer for Cody Rhodes

Is WWE moving towards a Rock vs Cody Rhodes match at WrestleMania 41?



Also read:

The Rock's return and recent confrontation with Cody Rhodes on SmackDown has possibly changed the trajectory of the road to WrestleMania 41.The road to WrestleMania 41 took a surprising turn with the return of The Final Boss, The Rock, on the February 21st edition of SmackDown. He made the announcement a day before the show and teased what the fans could expect from his shocking re-emergence.The Final came back to SmackDown, taking place in New Orleans, Louisiana, first to deliver the big gift he teased by announcing that the city will be the host to WrestleMania 42 next year. Right after, he called out the WWE Champion, Cody Rhodes. The American Nightmare came down to the ring and embraced The Rock in a show of respect.The Rock revealed that he had a deep respect for Cody Rhodes' remarkable reign as champion and his rise as the face of WWE. Witnessing that, The Final Boss made an offer to Cody to become "his champion." The Rock promised to open the doors of greater opportunities and help him achieve the same level of success and worldwide fame as his own if he decided to "sell his soul" to him. Cody Rhodes is set to deliver his answer to The Rock at the WWE Elimination Chamber 2025 event.During the segment, Cody Rhodes said that he was the champion of fans but still did not give a nod of refusal to The Rock's offer. Regardless, their confrontation reignited the conversation of a match between The Rock and Cody Rhodes at WrestleMania 41. These were the early plans for the show, but it was reportedly dropped after The Rock said that he would not be available to wrestle.Moreover, it has already been announced that the winner of the Men's Elimination Chamber will face Cody Rhodes for the Undisputed WWE Championship at WrestleMania 41. While the match seems very unlikely, it does not rule out the fact that The Rock can be involved in some capacity in the title picture at The Show of Shows.Should Cody Rhodes refuse his offer at the Elimination Chamber, The Rock could use his power as a TKO Board member to extend the same offer to another star and insert him into the WWE title. Moreover, another scenario can see The Rock and Cody Rhodes shockingly joining hands at the show, in a similar scenario to Steve Austin siding with his rival, Vince McMahon. Regardless of what happens, all eyes will be on Cody Rhodes at the Elimination Chamber as he comes to Toronto to deliver his answer to The Final Boss.
Article Summary: The rock returned to wwe smackdown with an offer for cody rhodes. The american nightmare came down to the ring and embraced the rock in a show of respect. Their confrontation reignited the conversation of a match between the rock and cody rhodes at wrestlemania 41.

Article Title: Will Giannis Antetokounmpo play tonight against the Houston Rockets? Latest update on the Milwaukee Bucks star's injury report (February 25, 2025)
Article Text:
Is Giannis Antetokounmpo playing tonight? (Image via Getty) Milwaukee Bucks Giannis Antetokounmpo Is Giannis Antetokounmpo playing tonight? Milwaukee Bucks injury report for tonight’s game against the Houston Rockets (February 25, 2025)

Bucks injury report Feb 25 (Image via NBA)

Houston Rockets injury report for tonight’s game against the Milwaukee Bucks (February 25, 2025) When and where to watch the Milwaukee Bucks play tonight against the Houston Rockets (February 25, 2025)? Theare gearing up for a crucial matchup against the Houston Rockets on Tuesday, February 25, at the Toyota Center, but all eyes are on’s injury status. The two-time MVP is listed as probable due to a calf issue, raising questions about his availability and potential impact on the game. Giannis Antetokounmpo , who leads the Bucks with 31.0 points and 12.0 rebounds per game, has been a cornerstone of Milwaukee’s success this season. His probable status suggests he is likely to suit up, but the calf injury could limit his minutes or effectiveness. The Bucks, currently 32-24, will need their star at full strength to counter a Rockets team that boasts a strong defensive record, allowing just 109.0 points per game (fifth in the NBA).The injury report also highlights other key absences for Milwaukee. Pat Connaughton remains out with a calf injury, while Gary Trent Jr. is probable with a knee issue. These setbacks could test the Bucks’ depth, especially against a Rockets squad that has been dominant on the boards, leading the league with 47.9 rebounds per game.For Houston, injuries are also a concern. Fred VanVleet (ankle), Jae’Sean Tate (back), and Dillon Brooks (illness) are all questionable, while Cody Zeller is out for personal reasons. Despite these challenges, the Rockets have been formidable, outscoring opponents by 3.9 points per game, thanks in large part to Jalen Green’s team-leading 21.5 points per game.The Bucks, however, have their own strengths. They rank 12th in the NBA in scoring (114.2 points per game) and sixth in three-pointers made (14.4 per game), with Damian Lillard contributing 3.5 threes per contest. Giannis Antetokounmpo’s presence will be critical in maintaining this offensive rhythm, especially against a Rockets defense that has been stingy all season.Also read: Will Kevin Durant play tonight against the Memphis Grizzlies? Latest update on the Phoenix Suns star's injury report (February 25, 2025) As tip-off approaches, the Bucks’ medical staff will likely monitor Antetokounmpo’s condition closely. His probable status offers hope, but the calf injury remains a wildcard. Fans can catch the action live on Fubo, with regional restrictions potentially applying.
Article Summary: Giannis antetokounmpo is listed as probable due to a calf injury. The bucks host the houston rockets on tuesday, february 25, at the toyota center. The two-time mvp leads the bucks with 31.0 points and 12.0 rebounds per game. Fans can catch the game live on fubo.

Article Title: “He snubbed them”: Don Cherry critiques Wayne Gretzky's honorary captain role amid Donald Trump’s tariff dispute at 4 Nations Face-Off finals
Article Text:
Image via Getty Images

Don Cherry’s Grapevine debate: Why fans are upset with Wayne Gretzky

Don Cherry defended Wayne Gretzky amid backlash over his role as Team Canada ’s honorary captain at the 4 Nations Face-Off . Fans criticized Gretzky for appearing aligned with the U.S. and his past support for Donald Trump . Cherry urged respect for Gretzky’s legacy, despite political tensions and controversy.Hockey Canada secured an overtime victory, but many fans remained upset with Wayne Gretzky. Don Cherry addressed the controversy on his show Grapevine, where he discussed the issue with his brother, Tim Cherry. During the conversation, Tim shared his thoughts on the situation at the 9:40 mark, offering his perspective on why fans reacted so strongly to Gretzky’s actions.“The American players are probably banging their boards too, saying hey and he talked to the team before, like he talked to. The Canadian team before in the dressing room, he read the lineup, yeah? So it was Yeah, so like he had talked to the players. It wasn't like he snubbed them. He had talked to the players, gave them a little pep talk before the game” Tim said.Don Cherry emphasized that the issue is more about Trump than Gretzky. "It's not Gretzky. They're mad at Trump... He did give the thumbs up, but he would’ve given the thumbs up to the player, to the Canadian players too." However fans have criticized Wayne Gretzky, leading to a petition to rename "Wayne Gretzky Drive.”Trade tensions between the U.S. and Canada worsened the Gretzky controversy, as Donald Trump’s tariffs and his endorsement of Gretzky as a potential leader if Canada joined the U.S. fueled Canadian frustration.Despite the off-ice drama, the 4 Nations Face-Off final was an intense match. Team Canada ultimately secured a 3-2 overtime victory against the United States, giving Canadian fans something to celebrate after the controversy surrounding Gretzky.Also Read: Anaheim Ducks' Trevor Zegras suspended for 3 games without pay for interference on Detroit Red Wings' Michael Rasmussen Despite backlash, Don Cherry and Bobby Orr defended Gretzky, urging focus on his hockey legacy over politics. The controversy underscores the growing intersection of sports and political scrutiny.
Article Summary: Don cherry defended wayne gretzky amid backlash over his role as team canada’s honorary captain at the 4 nations face-off. Don cherry addressed the controversy on his show grapevine, where he discussed the issue with his brother, tim cherry.

Article Title: Jimmy Butler makes unique record that no Golden State Warriors player has ever reached
Article Text:
Jimmy Butler. Image via: John Hefti-Imagn Images

Jimmy Butler

Golden State Warriors

Jimmy Butler makes new record at the Golden State Warriors



Jimmy Butler . Image via: Image via Benny Sieu- Imagn Images

has created a stunning history for the. The team is seeing immediate returns on their blockbuster move to acquire Jimmy Butler. In just six games, Butler has transformed the team, helping them rise from inconsistency to a dominant 5-1 record since his debut. His arrival has been positive for the franchise, making him an instant fan favorite in the Bay Area. Jimmy Butler ’s integration into the Golden State Warriors’ system has been nothing short of spectacular. In his first six games with the team, he has already written his name into franchise history in golden words. As the Warriors’ official X handle revealed: "Jimmy Butler III is the first Warrior in franchise history to have 120+ Points, 30+ Rebounds and 30+ Assists through a player's first six games with the team."Across these six games, he’s averaged 20.0 points, 5.7 rebounds, 5.5 assists, and 1.5 steals while shooting 46.7% from the field. Remarkably, he’s been able to put up these numbers despite struggling from beyond the arc, shooting only 10% from three. His efficiency at the free-throw line— where he’s hitting 89.1% on 9.2 attempts per game— has been a major factor in his success.Head coach Steve Kerr praised Butler’s growing impact on the team, “The game feels easier right now for us. Every play is not as crucial when there’s a consistency in the game. You can make a mistake and keep playing and not feel like, ‘Oh, my god, we’ve got to flip things right now.’ I just think the consistency of what we’re seeing defensively is setting the tone.”Golden State’s decision to bring in Butler from the Miami Heat proved to be a huge success. Warriors’ star player Stephen Curry also hailed the management’s decision to acquire the former Heat star."There's a sense of urgency just because you're not going to be able to do it at this level forever. We talked about that pre-trade, which is why Jimmy is here, and we all love the expectations, we love playing for something meaningful, and the only energy you're putting out there is to try and get it done. That's it. We're in a moment where we still can win."Also Read: Did Jimmy Butler Take a Dig at Miami Heat? NBA Icon Reveals Feeling ‘Wanted' by Golden State Warriors As for Butler, he has previously shared that he found the joy of playing basketball again right after the news of his trade to the Warriors broke. It is no secret that he had a huge rift with his former team Miami Heat facing multiple suspensions in just a month that sidelined Butler for several crucial matches. Regardless, he recently extended his good wishes to his former team and shared that he is in the Bay Area to claim more records and win championships.
Article Summary: Jimmy butler is the first warrior in franchise history to have 120+ points, 30+ rebounds and 30+ assists through a player's first six games with the team. Golden state’s decision to bring in butler from the miami heat proved to be a huge success. The team is seeing immediate returns on their blockbuster move to acquire butler.

Article Title: Auston Matthews gave a stern response when asked if Connor McDavid's winning goal at the 4 Nations Face-Off final haunted him
Article Text:
Image via Getty Images

Auston Matthews on Connor McDavid’s winning goal at the 4 Nations Face-Off finals

Connor McDavid and Auston Matthews have been credited with promoting the return of best-on-best hockey. As the No. 1 picks in the 2015 and 2016 NHL drafts, they were teased with a version of this during the 2016 World Cup of Hockey. However, they had never played for their respective countries at true best-on-best. Auston Matthews responded to McDavid's game-winning goal in the 4 Nations final with some blunt words.Auston Matthews excelled in the 4 Nations Face-Off final, scoring three points and two assists. He played over 20 minutes per game and missed a deflection on McDavid's goal, which led to a 3-2 loss to Canada.On Saturday, a reporter asked Matthews if Connor McDavid's goal haunted him to which Auston Matthews simply replied, "Sure, Kevin." with a smile. Canada won their fourth consecutive international tournament with Connor McDavid's goal, while Matthews couldn't break up the play for the final goal."It's a great game. It's a great sport. And I hope we put on a good show these last couple days and gained some fans. Ultimately, you can't ask for a better show than that," Connor McDavid said after Canada's win.Nathan MacKinnon scored the first goal in the game, followed by Brady Tkachuk and Jake Sanderson. Sam Bennett tied the game 2-2. In overtime, McDavid scored the game-winner, and Jordan Binnington made 31 saves for Canada. USA defenseman Zach Werenski believes the team is close to Canada and believes they will win soon."It just makes us hungrier," Zach Werenski said, via NHL.com. "We know now that we're neck and neck with Canada. We expect to be in those games with them and expect to win. I think that's exciting for this group. It gives us a lot of confidence that our time is coming, our time is now. It's exciting.”Also post: Florida Panthers forward Matthew Tkachuk is out of Saturday's game against Seattle Kraken due to a lower-body injury Auston Matthews expressed pride in his team despite the loss to Team Canada in the 4 Nations Face-Off final. Auston Matthews, who assisted on goals by Brady Tkachuk and Jake Sanderson, will now focus on the season ahead as Maple Leafs captain.
Article Summary: Auston matthews responded to connor mcdavid's game-winning goal in the 4 nations final with some blunt words. Matthews played over 20 minutes per game and missed a deflection on mcdavid’s goal, which led to a 3-2 loss to canada. Canada won their fourth consecutive international tournament.

Article Title: Taylor Swift faces backlash on Instagram, loses over 144,200 followers following her booing at the Super Bowl
Article Text:
Image via Getty Images

Taylor Swift has been sacked from Instagram after being booed at the Super Bowl

Taylor Swift has been facing backlash from Instagram after being booed at the Super Bowl, according to SportsMillions. Conservative fans, including Alexis Winters of Queens, believe the drop in followers and booing signals Swift should focus on music and avoid politics.Travis Kelce, boyfriend of Taylor Swift, has gained over 12,370 followers on Instagram following his Super Bowl loss to the Philadelphia Eagles, according to SportsMillions, which used Social Blade to track their social media stats.Taylor Swift's Instagram following has plummeted to over 144,200 followings following the Super Bowl LIX controversy , according to SportsMillions data, causing speculation about the reasons behind the backlash.Swift's presence at the Super Bowl, where she supported her boyfriend, Kansas City Chiefs tight end Travis Kelce, was met with mixed reactions. Some fans were excited to see her, while others expressed frustration, particularly those who disagree with her political stances. Some speculate it stems from her growing political influence.Alexis Winters, a member of the New York Young Republican Club, attributed the decrease in followers to a broader sentiment among certain conservative fans. "We are tired of celebrities calling down to us from their ivory towers, giving their two cents on policies that will never impact them," Winters stated.She further added, "Taylor Swift is simply the best example of this, and her loss of hundreds of thousands of Instagram followers represents the hundreds of thousands of Americans who chose their president over the woke Hollywood mob."While Taylor Swift's Instagram followers declined, Kelce gained over 12,370 followers after the Super Bowl, according to Social Blade tracking. Some fans argue that Swift's criticism is unfair, especially when compared to Kelce's reception. "I mostly think it's equally maddening and unsurprising how people seem more eager to celebrate the man dating a successful woman than the actual woman herself," said Sara Koger, 32, of Buckeye, Arizona.Jenna Piwowarczyk, a leader of the "Swifties for Trump" movement, expressed disappointment over Swift's treatment during the game. "When Travis made an appearance on the Eras Tour, Swifties were excited to see him and cheered him on. When Taylor was shown on the Jumbotron, she was booed," Piwowarczyk noted. "I understand the demographic of the Super Bowl attendees are not fans of Taylor Swift, but the generalized hatred towards her for simply supporting her boyfriend is uncalled for and gross."Also read: Travis Kelce’s ex Kayla Nicole stuns in a viral Fenty ad, blending seduction and empowerment that could make Taylor Swift nervous Taylor Swift's influence remains strong, with her Eras Tour becoming the highest-grossing concert tour of all time. Despite a drop in followers, her career shows no signs of slowing down, as her presence remains a powerful force in social media, sporting events, and the music industry, sparking conversation.
Article Summary: Travis kelce, boyfriend of taylor swift, has gained over 12,370 followers on instagram following his super bowl loss to the philadelphia eagles. Conservative fans, including alexis winters of queens, believe the drop in followers and booing signals swift should focus on music and avoid politics.

Article Title: “Why would they do that?”: Khris Middleton lets his disappointment known after Milwaukee Bucks traded him for Kyle Kuzma
Article Text:
Khris Middleton. Image via: Getty Images

Khris Middleton

Milwaukee Bucks to the

Washington Wizards

Khris Middleton was disappointed after the Milwaukee Bucks traded him to the Washington Wizards

The recent NBA trades have received baffling reactions all around. While the Luka Doncic trade was the highlight and generated wide attention,’s surprising trade from thealso grabbed headlines. The Bucks were in a rush to acquire Kyle Kuzma for which they had to let go of Middleton. Recently the former Bucks forward shared his candid thoughts on his trade sharing his disappointment with a heavy heart. Khris Middleton recently opened up about the emotional toll of being traded from the Milwaukee Bucks, a team he once believed would be his home for life. Speaking to The Athletic’s Eric Nehm, the former NBA champion admitted he’s still processing the move. "Yeah, it's a range," Middleton said."Like, it's a cycle I go through a lot of times. I'm trying to get out of that cycle now because it's over with, and there's no point of really going down that path. But definitely anger. Definitely like sadness. Like denial, 'Why would they do that?' Questioning their decision and stuff like that," he continued.However, he acknowledged Buck's decision as the end of the day, it is business over emotion. "I mean, I could say my time could have ran out a long time ago. They held onto me, believed in the potential, believed in the work that they saw. But I think this time, it was just, we think a different route is better for our team going forward. And I can't do nothing but respect that," he added.Following his departure from the Bucks, the 33-year-old shared a heartfelt message on social media. “Twelve years ago, I arrived in this city as a young player with big dreams. Today, I leave as an NBA champion, 3x All-Star, an Olympic gold medalist, and most importantly, someone who Milwaukee helped shape into the person and player I am today,” he wrote in a goodbye message for his former team.He continued, “From the moment I stepped foot in this city, you embraced me. Together, we experienced the rebuilding years, the emergence of a championship contender,and ultimately, the unforgettable journey to the 2021 NBA Championship. That magical run will stay with me forever - the late-game shots, the comeback victories, and most importantly, bringing the Larry O'Brien Trophy back to Milwaukee after 50 years.”Middleton also wrote a heartfelt message to Bucks fans, “Your passion and support through every up and down has been nothing short of amazing. From the early days at the Bradley Center, to the energy at Fiserv Forum and the packed Deer District during our championship run - the way this entire city rallies behind its team is something special that I'll always cherish.”Also Read: Orlando Magic coach’s recollection of Luka Doncic’s work ethic shows big Dallas Maverick loss after shocking NBA trade However, he asserted that it was not a goodbye, but rather a big “thank you” from his heart saying that the team will always have a special place in him but the new chapter of his career with the Wizards, as Middleton shared, was also exciting for him. This season Middleton is averaging 12.4 points per game, 3.7 rebounds, 4.4 assists and 50.2 field goal percentage.
Article Summary: Khris middleton was traded from the milwaukee bucks to the washington wizards. The bucks were in a rush to acquire kyle kuzma for which they had to let go of middleton. The former nba champion admitted he’s still processing the move.

Brandon Phillips’ net worth and earnings from his MLB career and business ventures

Jade Cargill and Brandon Phillips have been together since 2015, but no one knows when they actually got married

Read More:

Jade Cargill and former Cincinnati Reds second baseman Brandon Phillips didn’t plan to cross paths, but when they did, it clicked instantly. Their first meeting?
